Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
com.csce331.project2.database.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
DatabaseManager provides a centralized interface for database operations. Handles connections to the PostgreSQL database and provides CRUD operations for menu items, inventory items, employees, and seasonal menu items.
Author:
Nikhil

    • getConnection

      public Connection getConnection() throws SQLException
      Gets a connection to the database.
      Returns:
      a Connection object to the PostgreSQL database
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getAllMenuItems

      public List<Menu> getAllMenuItems()
      Retrieves all menu items from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of Menu objects containing all menu items

    • addMenuItem

      public boolean addMenuItem(int id, String name, double price, String ingredients)
      Inserts a new menu item.
      Parameters:
      id - menu item ID
      name - menu item name
      price - menu item price
      ingredients - JSON string of ingredient usage
      Returns:
      true if one or more rows were inserted

    • updateMenuItem

      public boolean updateMenuItem(int id, String name, double price, String ingredients)
      Updates an existing menu item by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - menu item ID
      name - new name
      price - new price
      ingredients - new ingredients JSON
      Returns:
      true if one or more rows were updated

      Returns:

      public boolean addSeasonalMenuItem(int id, String name, double price, String ingredients)
